fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

fields.title: Schindler's List
fields.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
fields.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

fields.title: Goodfellas
fields.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
